name: Babel-2014
short_description:
• You are NOT allowed to use any SIP or other VOIP library.
• You MUST use the PortAudio library for anything sound related (http://www.
portaudio.com/).
• You MUST use Speex for the compression codec (http://www.speex.org/).
• You MUST use Qt (http://trolltech.com/) for the client’s graphical user interface.
• You are allowed and encouraged to use Qt library on the client side.
• You are NOT allowed to use any Qt library on the server side.
• You are allowed and encouraged to use BOOST C++ libraries on the server side (http:
//www.boost.org).
• You are NOT allowed to use any BOOST C++ library on the client side.
• POCO C++ libraries (http://pocoproject.org/) are very cool but NOT allowed.
• PortAudio and Speex are C libraries, so you MUST create your own abstraction as
seen during your second year C++ knowledge unit.
summary: The Babel project aims to create a SIP-like Voice Over IP protocol

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 3.0 (GPLv3)
